snippet: Juventus needed a second-half equalizer from Fabio Quagliarella to earn a draw 1-1 at FC Copenhagen in their opening match in the Champions League on Tuesday.
abstract: Juventus ties FC Copenhagen, 1-1, during their opening match in Champions League; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Juventus needed a second-half equalizer from Fabio Quagliarella to earn a draw 1-1 at FC Copenhagen in their opening match in the Champions League on Tuesday.

headline.main: Juventus Salvages Tie in Champions League
headline.print_headline:
Juventus Salvages Tie
In Champions League
